scripts.dev:cf: ( sleep 10 && curl http://localhost:8788/v2/seed ) & wrangler pages dev --compatibility-date=2023-01-12 --kv containerFlareKV --r2 containerFlareR2 -- astro dev #--proxy 3000
scripts.preview: npm run build && rm functions/[[path]].js && wrangler pages dev ./dist
scripts.publish: npm run build && npx wrangler pages publish --branch main dist/
scripts.logs:cf: wrangler pages deployment tail --project-name containerflare --environment preview
scripts.pull:remote: docker run hello-world:latest && docker image rm -f hello-world:latest
scripts.burp: sudo nano /etc/systemd/system/docker.service.d/http-proxy.conf && sudo systemctl daemon-reload && sudo systemctl restart docker
